casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Alphonzo HARVEY 290A18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 11, 2018 Jeffrey William Gillette, Attorney at Law, for Harvey, Alphonzo. Thomas O. Lawton, III, Assistant Attorney General, Robert A. Evans, Jr., District Attorney, for State of North Carolina

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 10th of October 2018 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 11th of October 2018."

Defendant shall have up to and including the 17th day of October 2018 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
